---
title: "Runoff Volume Calculations"
format: html
---

```{r}
# load in lib and function for calculating storm run off
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
source(here::here("src", "storm_runoff.R"))
```

```{r}
# Create data frame desired vectors
a <- 182
IA <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)
pred_vol <- predict_runoff(IA, a)

runoff_df <- data.frame(IA, pred_vol)
```

```{r}
# Create plot for volume per impervious fraction 
run_off_plot <- runoff_df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = IA, y = pred_vol)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_line() + 
  labs(
    x = "Impervious fraction",
    y = "Volume (ft^3)"
  )

ggsave( filename = here::here("figs", "run_off_plot.png"),
  plot = run_off_plot)
```
